{"id":836446342,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1667527600,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"11 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/836446342/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Vowels of a String","memory":"7.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    bool isVowel(char c){\n        c = tolower(c);\n        if(c == 'a' || c=='e' || c=='i' || c=='o' || c=='u') return true;\n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    string reverseVowels(string s) {\n        int start = 0, end = s.size() - 1;\n        while(start < end){\n            if(!isVowel(s[start])) start++;\n            if(!isVowel(s[end])) end--;\n            \n            if(isVowel(s[start]) && isVowel(s[end])){\n                swap(s[start], s[end]);\n                start++, end--;\n            }\n        }\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-vowels-of-a-string","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
